name: DarkLight (P-K Games)
description:
Top down arcade style shooter. In the world where light has taken over every thing you play as a the last black hole. You must rectify the unbalance of the universe by absorbing the light of the 3 elemental s.

Warning Hard!!!

Controls---------------

W = Move Up

S = Move Down

A = Move Left

D = Move Right

Shift = Dash

Right Click = Target Enemy

Left Click = Shoot

Main Mechanics--------

Random Generation

Mininap

Mana is also your Health

Top down shooter Mechanics
